name: Universal Health Services, Inc.
description: Universal Health Services, Inc. (UHS) is one of the largest and most diversified healthcare management companies in the United States. Founded in 1978, UHS operates a network of acute care hospitals, behavioral health facilities, and ambulatory care centers, providing a wide range of healthcare services to communities across the nation. The company is dedicated to delivering high-quality healthcare services to patients, with a focus on improving health outcomes through compassionate and patient-centered care. UHS is known for its commitment to innovation in healthcare delivery, utilizing advanced technologies and best practices to enhance patient safety and satisfaction. The organization operates more than 400 facilities, including over 25 acute care hospitals and approximately 200 behavioral health facilities. UHS also offers outpatient services, emergency room care, and rehabilitation services. The company's mission is to provide superior quality healthcare services that improve the lives of patients, while also being a responsible corporate citizen. UHS is committed to enhancing the healthcare experience through continuous improvement and investing in its workforce. With a strong emphasis on community health, UHS actively participates in initiatives that promote wellness and disease prevention.
